edu.rit.pj2

Class TerminateException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • edu.rit.pj2.TerminateException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class TerminateException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    Class TerminateException causes the PJ2 Job or Task that throws it to terminate. No error message or exception stack trace is printed. An exit code specified as a constructor argument is returned to the operating system.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int exitCode
      Exit code to be returned to the operating system.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TerminateException()
      Construct a new terminate exception with an exit code of 0.
      TerminateException(int exitCode)
      Construct a new terminate exception with the given exit code.
